TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListSourceHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ListSourceHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 當實作 介面所定義的成員時，供資料來源控制項使用。

span.span: Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是公用程式類別，提供簡化的實作資料來源控制項的介面。The class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the interface by data source controls. 資料來源控制項實作介面，但不是會擴充類別可以使用靜態它們自己的實作所定義的方法中的方法介面。Data source controls that implement the interface but do not extend the class can use the static methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the interface. 資料來源從擴充的控制項類別會自動繼承這些方法實作。Data source controls that extend from the class inherit these method implementations automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作資料來源類別的設計模式方法。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/CS/somedatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/VB/somedatasource.vb#2)]

span.span: Indicates whether the specified data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.

span.span: if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法的實作中屬性，將資料來源控制項的參考傳遞。Use this method in an implementation of the property, passing a reference to a data source control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作資料來源類別的設計模式方法。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. 屬性呼叫靜態方法。The property calls the static method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法的實作中方法，傳遞至資料來源控制項的參考。Use this method in an implementation of the method, passing a reference to a data source control. 物件，則會傳回實作介面。The object that is returned implements the interface. 您可以使用方法來擷取一份對應至的描述元從清單中的資料來源控制項相關聯的名稱。You can use the method to retrieve a list of descriptors that correspond to the names associated with the data source control from the list. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作資料來源類別的設計模式方法。The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the methods. 方法會呼叫靜態方法。The method calls the static method. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/CS/somedatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Controls.IListSourceHelper/VB/somedatasource.vb#3)]
